decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension and infilling of the existing front porch do not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because permitted development rights have been revoked at the application site through Condition 1 attached to planning permission reference 48006B/94/1199.

The proposed infilling of the existing front porch does not constitute permitted development by virtue of the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class D, paragraph D.1 (b) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because the resultant ground area (measured externally) of the structure would exceed 3 square metres.

The proposed infilling of the existing front porch does not constitute permitted development by virtue  of the provisions of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class D, paragraph D.1 (c) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) because the structure would be more than 3 metres above ground level.
description: Conversion of garage into a habitable room, infill of existing porch with a new door and windows, erection of a single storey rear extension (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
